BLIST.ITEM:
Using double quotes around the tag allows variables to be interpolated
using single quotes doesn't
using the tag without either behaves like double quotes
my $sender = "Buffy the Vampire Slayer";
my $recipient = "Spike";
print <<"END";
Dear $recipient,
I wish you to leave Sunnydale and never return.
Not Quite Love,
$sender
END
print <<'END';
Dear $recipient,
I wish you to leave Sunnydale and never return.
Not Quite Love,
$sender
END
